name: Drag the Words
description: Drag words into correct positions in text. Great for sentence completion and terminology practice.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate an object with a title, instruction, and an array of exercises with text containing *draggable* word markers.

schema.title: string - Exercise title
schema.instruction: string - Instruction text for the student

exercises.text: string - Text with *draggable* words marked by asterisks
exercises.draggables: array of strings - The draggable words (for reference)

example.title: Cell Biology Drag the Words
example.instruction: Drag the correct words into the blanks to complete the sentences about cell biology.

exercises.text: The *nucleus* is the control center of the cell that contains *DNA* and directs cell activities.
The *mitochondria* are known as the powerhouse of the cell because they produce *ATP* through cellular respiration.
The *cell membrane* controls what enters and exits the cell, acting as a selective *barrier*.
